system.biography:
TitleFFF 127-1 Yeoman LB
Birthday18 Halane 687
AppearanceAge 32, height 5â 9â, medium frame, weight 157 lb, attractive appearance, fair complexion, brown hair, grey eyes
Medical/PsycheScar (right forearm)
Size6
ArmorCloth tunic and leggings, quilt tunic and cowl, leather calf boots and gauntlets, plate half-helm; round shield, longbow, quiver with 24 arrows, falchion and dagger
Other EquipmentBelt pouch
Valuables19d in silver
Notes

Biography

Ealfric was born into war. His parents were minor nobility, cousins of Ranald Milaka. His father held a single manor in the Kingdom of Gemala, in what is now southern Kanday. His mother was four months pregnant when King Puril invaded. Ealfricâs father was killed and his mother fled into hiding, taking refuge with a sympathetic yeoman. She died giving birth to him. Ealfric was adopted into the yeomanâs clan and raised as their son. When he turned 18, they told him of the circumstances of his birth. He chose to leave the only family he had ever know and seek his fortune in the world, something which has made him very unpopular with his adopted siblings.

He is a master archer, a skill he learned from his adopted father. He is also a bowyer and fletcher of considerable ability. For several years, Ealfric earned a comfortable living teaching archery, winning competitions and making bows. This bored him and so he sought work in the north. There, he participated in several seasons of skirmishing with the Copper Hook in the service of the Earl of Selvos. He earned a formidable reputation as an archer and skirmisher. The Rethemi even offered a sizable bounty for him by name. Eventually he left the Earlâs service and drifted east, taking work as a mercenary.

Ealfric is a passive soul, accepting things as they happen. He has a great sense of humour and a taste for bad puns. A mysterious aura surrounds him and he doesnât talk much about his past. Lately he has taken up the unusual practice of climbing trees and mountains. Ealfric claims he finds great peace in the trees or quiet mountainsides. He has also found gargun on occasion and earned considerable bounties for their heads.

Adventure Hooks

Bows and Arrows. Longbows are not a common weapon, but are popular with PCs. Ealfric has set up shop and is selling longbows for an outrageous price. They are the best in many leagues. Ealfric offers to trade them two new bows if they do a small errand for him.

Recruiting. Ealfric has decided to go into business as a mercenary captain. He is looking for other bowmen to join his company. He already has a contract to escort a caravan in the same direction the PCs are going anyway.

Patents of Nobility. Ealfricâs adopted father gave him a document when he left home. It is a baptismal record from an itinerant Laranian priest who was present during his birth. If he can find this man, he can testify as to who Ealfricâs true mother was. Then Ealfric can petition the royal court in Dyrisa to have his rightful status restored. He will be very grateful to those who help him.

Credits

Robin Crossby.
